businessPurpose.title: 3. Business Purpose
businessPurpose.content: Development and operation of software solutions for Swiss QR-bill compliant invoicing and payment reconciliation services for Swiss and European businesses.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: Our data protection practices comply with the Swiss Federal Data Protection Act (FADP) and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

financialServices.title: Financial Services
financialServices.content: PayMatch is not a financial institution and does not provide financial services. We provide software tools for invoicing and payment reconciliation.

swissCompliance.title: Swiss Compliance
swissCompliance.content: Our invoicing solutions comply with Swiss QR-bill standards and Swiss Federal Tax Administration requirements.

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, trademarks, and intellectual property rights on this website are owned by Maxapp ZRH AG or our licensors. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

liability.title: 6. Liability Disclaimer
liability.content: While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we cannot guarantee the completeness or accuracy of all content. We disclaim liability for any damages arising from the use of this website.

externalLinks.title: 7. External Links
externalLinks.content: Our website may contain links to external websites. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these external sites.

governingLaw.title: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: This website and its content are governed by Swiss law. Any disputes shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts of Zug, Switzerland.

lastUpdated.title: 10. Last Updated
lastUpdated.content: This imprint was last updated on September 28, 2025. We reserve the right to make changes at any time without prior notice.
